name: Chinese Poached Black Cod
author: A Day In the Kitchen
summary: A traditional Chinese way to prepare fish, this meal is simple and flavorful, and is one of my favorite childhood dishes. Serve with rice.
ingredients: 1 ½ pounds black cod (sablefish) fillets, cut into large pieces
1 (3 inch) piece ginger, peeled and cut into matchsticks
2  green onions, cut into 1-inch pieces, or more to taste
3 tablespoons soy sauce, or more to taste
directions: Pour water and olive oil into a large saucepan over medium heat
Arrange cod fillets in a single layer in the pan; bring water to a simmer
Arrange ginger and green onions on top of the cod and replace lid; poach for 5 minutes more
Mix soy sauce and sesame oil into the poaching liquid; spoon over the cod
Transfer cod and liquid to a serving bowl, ladling sauce over the top
